item.title: CVE-2024-39653|2024-08-29T14:48:26.275Z -- e4j%20s.r.l. -- vikrentcar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in E4J s.R.L. VikRentCar allows SQL Injection.This issue affects VikRentCar: from n/a through 1.4.0.
